column4: im trying to "./configure" this KDE "window decoration" and i get this error, what can i do ?
checking for KDE... configure: error:
in the prefix, you've chosen, are no KDE headers installed. This will fail.
So, check this please and use another prefi
install kdelibs4-dev
using aptitude, possibly, as otherwise you'll have lots of dependencies to remove later
(if you want to remove them, that is)
care to be a little more specific?
URL?
also, can you give me the URL you downloaded that knifty from, so i can try compiling it?
from the errors you gave, it looks like that program is broken with ubuntu, but let me give it a try
that URL is about "silver deco", which isn't a compilable package...
what's URL to the archive you're actually trying to *compile*? i suppose it's knifty, but
will this work for me ? Really want that one ( http://www.kde-look.org/content/show.php?content=12330 )
just hold on some minutes, i've got to install the kde devs package to compile that stuff
you're using the wrong version of KNifty, you need this one: http://kde-look.org/content/show.php?content=8841
this one  ( http://www.kde-look.org/content/show.php?content=12330 )
that one doesn't seem to have anything to do with KNifty. let me try to compile it as well
Still getting humooongos errors of that knifty u gave me :O
install also kdebase-dev, and it should work
still here?
